settings

Summary
A single record with global settings. This provides a simply, typesafe way to store some global settings in the database. For example, we could define a global contact (email or phone) for technical assistance with the portal.


Fields Type Attributes Description
code  integer primary key
required
  		The unique key; hardcoded to 1.  
displayString  abstractText
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		A human readable semi-unique value used to identify each model. This typically uses something like the model's name or code which is expected to be unique enough to distinish between the different values within a particular project.  
lockVersion  lockVersion audit disabled   This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.  
someMessage  text100
max length: 100
allows printable 		  Just a placeholder until more useful settings are defined.  


Collections Type Comment
